kuranz.title: Kuranz
kuranz.description: Currency converter which automatically detect the currency based on your geolocation, HTML5 web app available on Firefox Marketplace.
kuranz.keywords: Design · Programming: JavaScript, RequireJS, Knockout, HTML5 (offline cache, localStorage, geolocation)

business-card.title: Business Card
business-card.description: My personal business card created in SVG with QR code adding vCard data directly to the address book in iPhone and Android.
